thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses USA Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses USA | www.smartbuyglasses.com
thread.title: Nathan Sims
thread.title_full: SmartBuyGlasses USA reviewed by Nathan Sims

author: Nathan Sims
title: Nathan Sims
text:
I reviewed Smartbuy Glasses on several sites before ordering to make sure I wasn't dealing with a merchant selling fake brands.
The Persol prescription sunglasses purchased came in an authentic package, were better than the progressive lenses for my regular glasses. I did a quick chat to ensure they were in stock. Due to some of the negative reviews, I made sure of this. The price was less than store bought, and even cheaper than the store bought plus progressive lenses. It even comes with an authenticity card, and were shipped super fast. I will use this merchant again.
